prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Pipe, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Pipe, and Drums, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Drums, Pipe, and Piano, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
No Bass is included in this song, which is made up of Piano, Guitar, Pipe, and Drums.
